name: FizzingSounds
0:
”Alexa open Fizzing Sounds”
”Alexa ask Fizzing Sounds to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fizzing sounds
des:
Immerse yourself in the soothing, effervescent sounds of fizzing bubbles. Perfect for relaxation, meditation, or simply creating a calm atmosphere, these fizzing sounds will help you unwind and de-stress.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Fizzing Sounds
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
